text: Sano kwa achina Samuda (twantumisye) nnongo n’jao (jwali) Swaleh. Jwalakwe jwatite: “E ŵandu ŵangu! Mun'galagatilani Allah, nganinkola nnungu jwine jwangaŵaga Jwalakwe, pamasile pachim'bichilile chilosyo chakuonechela palangulangu kuumila kwa M'mbuje gwenu. Aji ngamiya ja Allah jiŵele chilosyo kukwenu, basi jilekani jilyeje petaka lya Allah, ni ngasin'jikwaya ni yakusakala iliyose, itakwika mwainkwembekenye ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope.”
